content.body: Just noticed that in https://whatwg.org/chat the older matrix link no longer works

> The Matrix Public View has been discontinued
> The Matrix.org Foundation has narrowed the scope of projects it maintains to focus on delivering the best quality possible. If you’re an organisation interested in funding the return of view.matrix.org, please reach out to funding@matrix.org.
content.formatted_body:
The Matrix Public View has been discontinued
The Matrix.org Foundation has narrowed the scope of projects it maintains to focus on delivering the best quality possible. If you’re an organisation interested in funding the return of view.matrix.org, please reach out to funding@matrix.org.

content.body: I put it on the WHATNOT agenda (this thursday is APAC/EMEA time).
I haven't posted the minutes from last week because I don't have access, I've asked cwilso to do that and also create the issue etc.
